description:
The story takes place in Japari Park, an enormous integrated zoo built somewhere in this world. A mysterious substance found there, called "Sand Star," causes the animals to turn into humanoid beings called "Animal Girls"! These new creatures spend every day peacefully with the zoo`s visitors... but after some time, a lost child turns up in the park. The child`s attempt to find the way home turns into a great adventure with the Animal Girls!
Source: crunchyroll

REGULAR.description:
Serval`s life in Japari Park is happy as can be. One day, she finds a lost child with no memories! After the curious cat names her newfound friend, the pair set out for Japari Library to find out who the lost little one is!
Source: crunchyroll

Serval and Bag find out that Japari Park has a "bus"--the perfect way to traverse the park. They recruit Jaguar to help them get to it, but when they find it...
Source: crunchyroll

Bag and Serval need to charge the bus`s battery at a mountaintop café, but can`t take the ropeway there. Instead, they ask Crested Ibis for help, only her singing is, uh, indescribable.
Source: crunchyroll

Bag, Serval, and Lucky Beast make it to the Desert Area, but their path is blocked by a sandstorm! With the help of Sand Cat, the girls head underground, where they meet the mysterious Tsuchinoko...
Source: crunchyroll

The bus is back on the road and the tour going swimmingly, until they suddenly crash into Beaver`s house-in-progress! A guilty Serval and Kaban decide to help her rebuild. Then, when they run into Black-tailed Prairie Dog, too...
Source: crunchyroll

Our heroines find themselves taken captive by a group of Friends wielding weapons and marched to the Friends` leader, Lion. They soon find out that the Lion Army and the Moose Army are warring over territory--and Kaban and Serval are caught in the middle of it!
Source: crunchyroll

The girls finally arrive at the library, where they ask the resident wise owls what kind of animal Kaban is. But if they want an answer, they’ll have to get through a cooking challenge first.
Source: crunchyroll

Serval and Kaban have tickets to a concert by PPP, the penguin idol unit! When they introduce idol fanatic Margay to the newest PPP generation, the pressure gets to be too much for one of the penguins. Can Serval, Kaban, and Margay save the concert?
Source: crunchyroll

The next destination for the Japari bus: the Snowy Mountains Area. Kaban and company meet the fox caretakers of the local hot spring and end up lending them a paw, but tragedy strikes...
Source: crunchyroll

Kaban, Serval, and Lucky Beast stop at a lodge for the night, only to find out that it might be haunted. Can they follow the clues to uncover the truth behind the ghost?
Source: crunchyroll

Serval and friends have finally made it to the harbor, but a gigantic Cerulean appears. The girls work with Brown Bear and her fellow Cerulean Hunters to face off against it, but...
Source: crunchyroll

The giant Cerulean has been dealt with, and another Sandstar eruption means there`ll be new Friends, so it`s the perfect time for a park celebration! Plus, the Friends want to give Kaban a certain present...
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Kemono Friends Housou Kaishi Chokuzen Tokuban "Kemono Darake no Shinshun! Summer Party"
けものフレンズ 放送開始直前特番「けものだらけの新春! サマーパーティー」
케모노 프렌즈 방송 개시 직전 특별 프로 「짐승 투성이의 신춘! 서머 파티」
Nissin no Donbei x Kemono Friends
日清のどん兵衛 × けものフレンズ
